definition: The term refers to the collective actions, strategies, and decisions undertaken by a governing body or administration. It encompasses the policies and measures implemented by a government to address various societal, economic, and political issues. It is commonly used to describe the overall political agenda and direction pursued by a government in a specific country or region.

examples.german: Die Regierungspolitik hat zu einer Verbesserung der Wirtschaft geführt.
examples.english: Government policy has led to an improvement in the economy.

examples.german: Die Regierungspolitik zielt darauf ab, die Arbeitslosigkeit zu reduzieren.
examples.english: Government policy aims to reduce unemployment.

examples.german: Die Regierungspolitik hat zu einer Erhöhung der Steuern geführt.
examples.english: Government policy has led to an increase in taxes.

examples.german: Die Regierungspolitik hat den Bildungssektor stark beeinflusst.
examples.english: Government policy has strongly influenced the education sector.

examples.german: Die Regierungspolitik hat zu einer Verschärfung der Umweltgesetze geführt.
examples.english: Government policy has led to a tightening of environmental laws.
